content.rendered:
• Customer Reviews: 
    4.9 out of 5 stars    18 ratings

excerpt.rendered: BioBalance 5% Lugol’s Iodine Solution is made from premium extra pure grade Potassium Iodide and Elemental Iodine. Extra pure grades are high purity grades free from heavy metal and other impurities and are designed for high end applications. Molecular Iodine is derived from deep mines. Iodine is very reactive to impurities. Only borosilicate glass is used in manufacturing process without use of any metal or plastic.
